query: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY id
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3pckBUcfk32JAND.root --database UCCzLN8Vsrp5hwCzJ8jirs --execute SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY id

rows.name: Creamy Lavender Shea Soap
rows.description: A gentle, calming soap infused with lavender essential oil and creamy shea butter. Perfect for sensitive skin, it cleanses softly while leaving a soothing floral scent.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Lavender Essential oil

rows.name: Sweet Peppermint Pop Body Scrub
rows.description: An invigorating scrub made with Himalayan pink salt and sweet peppermint oil. Exfoliates gently while leaving skin refreshed and smooth.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Sweet Peppermint Essential oil

rows.name: Smokie Sultry Sandalwood Soap
rows.description: A warm, earthy soap with deep sandalwood notes. Rich and grounding, it cleanses while leaving a sensual, smoky scent on the skin.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Sandalwood Essential oil

rows.name: Variety 5 Soap Pack
rows.description: A perfect sampler of five artisan soaps, each crafted with natural ingredients and unique scents. A thoughtful gift or personal treat to explore new favorites.
rows.ingredients: NULL

rows.name: Complete Body Care Gift Set Lavender Lemongrass
rows.description: A curated gift set featuring lavender and lemongrass favorites: soap, scrub, and cream for complete body care and a refreshing spa-at-home experience.
rows.ingredients: NULL

rows.name: Orange Grove Lavender Soap
rows.description: A harmonious blend of bright orange and calming lavender. This soap cleanses gently while offering a unique, uplifting citrus-floral scent.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil, Lavender Essential oil

rows.name: Orange Creamsicle Swirl Body Cream
rows.description: Playful and nostalgic, this cream swirls creamy vanilla with vibrant orange for a sweetly scented, skin-loving hydration.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil

rows.name: Holiday Sugar Cookie Soap
rows.description: A festive, sweet-scented soap reminiscent of freshly baked sugar cookies. Warm and comforting, it's perfect for the holiday season or anytime you crave a cozy treat.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Vanilla Fragrance oil, Sugar Cookie Fragrance oil

rows.name: Sweet Peppermint Soap
rows.description: A refreshing, cool soap with sweet peppermint essential oil. Invigorating and gentle, it awakens the senses while nourishing the skin.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Sweet Peppermint Essential oil

rows.name: Orange Creamsicle Swirl Soap
rows.description: A playful, nostalgic soap swirled with creamy vanilla and bright orange. It cleanses gently while delivering a sweet, citrusy aroma.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil

rows.name: Lavender Lemongrass Soap
rows.description: A balanced blend of calming lavender and refreshing lemongrass. This soap soothes the senses while gently cleansing and nourishing the skin.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Lavender Essential oil, Lemongrass Essential oil

rows.name: Raspberry Cream Goat Milk Dream Soap
rows.description: A luxurious soap made with creamy goat milk and sweet raspberry fragrance. It gently cleanses while delivering rich moisture and a fruity, delicate scent.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Goat Milk, Raspberry Fragrance oil

rows.name: Minted Eucalyptus Breeze Soap
rows.description: A cooling, invigorating soap with peppermint and eucalyptus essential oils. Perfect for awakening the senses and refreshing the skin.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Peppermint Essential oil, Eucalyptus Essential oil

rows.name: Winter Woodland Retreat Soap
rows.description: A cozy, woodsy soap inspired by winter forests. Earthy and grounding, it cleanses while evoking the calm of a snowy woodland escape.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Cedarwood Essential oil, Pine Essential oil

rows.name: Lemongrass Sunrise Soap
rows.description: A bright, energizing soap with fresh lemongrass essential oil. Uplifting and cleansing, it's perfect for starting your day with a burst of sunshine.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Lemongrass Essential oil

rows.name: Sunrise Surprise Soap
rows.description: A cheerful, vibrant soap with a surprise blend of citrus and floral notes. Refreshing and gentle, it brightens your morning routine.
rows.ingredients: Olive oil, Coconut oil, Shea Butter, Castor oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil, Ylang Ylang Essential oil

rows.name: Himalayan Salt Body Scrub – Lemongrass Sunrise
rows.description: A bright, energizing scrub with lemongrass essential oil and Himalayan pink salt. Exfoliates and uplifts for radiant, soft skin.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Lemongrass Essential oil

rows.name: Himalayan Salt Body Scrub – Winter Wonderland Retreat
rows.description: A cozy, woodsy scrub with cedarwood and pine oils. Exfoliates while evoking the calm of a winter forest.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Cedarwood Essential oil, Pine Essential oil

rows.name: Himalayan Salt Body Scrub – Creamy Lavender
rows.description: A calming scrub with lavender essential oil and Himalayan pink salt. Gently exfoliates while soothing the senses.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Lavender Essential oil

rows.name: Lavender Lemongrass Body Scrub
rows.description: A balanced scrub blending calming lavender with refreshing lemongrass. Exfoliates and nourishes for smooth, radiant skin.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Lavender Essential oil, Lemongrass Essential oil

rows.name: Smokie Sultry Sandalwood Body Scrub
rows.description: A warm, earthy scrub with sandalwood essential oil. Exfoliates while leaving a sensual, grounding scent on the skin.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Sandalwood Essential oil

rows.name: Zesty Orange Body Scrub
rows.description: A bright, uplifting scrub with sweet orange essential oil. Exfoliates and energizes for smooth, glowing skin.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil

rows.name: Orange Creamsicle Swirl Body Scrub
rows.description: A playful scrub with sweet orange and vanilla notes. Exfoliates gently while delivering a nostalgic, creamy scent.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil

rows.name: Minted Eucalyptus Breeze Body Scrub
rows.description: A cooling, refreshing scrub with peppermint and eucalyptus oils. Exfoliates and invigorates for smooth, awakened skin.
rows.ingredients: Himalayan Pink Salt, Jojoba oil, Olive oil, Peppermint Essential oil, Eucalyptus Essential oil

rows.name: Minted Eucalyptus Breeze Body Cream
rows.description: A cooling, refreshing body cream with peppermint and eucalyptus oils to invigorate the skin while deeply hydrating with a silky finish.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Peppermint Essential oil, Eucalyptus essential oil

rows.name: Creamy Lavender Shea Body Cream
rows.description: Luxuriously calming lavender blended into a creamy shea butter base for rich, soothing moisture that melts into sensitive skin.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Lavender Essential oil

rows.name: Raspberry Cream Goat Milk Dream Body Cream
rows.description: A decadent cream infused with sweet raspberry and goat milk for extra nourishing hydration and a fruity, delicate finish.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Raspberry Fragrance oil

rows.name: Zesty Orange Body Cream
rows.description: A bright, uplifting body cream that captures the juicy energy of fresh oranges while delivering smooth, lasting hydration.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Orange Essential oil

rows.name: Smokie Sultry Sandalwood Body Cream
rows.description: Deep, earthy sandalwood wrapped in a creamy base that hydrates and leaves a warm, sensual fragrance on the skin.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sandalwood Essential oil

rows.name: Lavender Lemongrass Body Cream
rows.description: A balanced cream blending refreshing lemongrass with calming lavender, offering both bright energy and soothing moisture.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Lavender Essential oil, Lemongrass essential oil

rows.name: Sweet Peppermint Body Cream
rows.description: A cool, minty body cream that refreshes and awakens the skin while providing soft, lasting moisture.
rows.ingredients: Coconut Butter, Shea Butter, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Peppermint Essential oil

rows.name: Variety 10 Soap Pack
rows.description: An abundant collection of ten handcrafted soaps, offering a full spectrum of fragrances and benefits. Ideal for gifting or stocking up on everyday luxury.
rows.ingredients: NULL
